discovery.for_you.title: For you
discovery.for_you.description: Songs you have not heard yet
discovery.favorites.title: Favorites
discovery.favorites.description: The top most played favorite songs
discovery.random.title: Random

output_diagram.source.title: Source

output_diagram.dsp.title: DSP
output_diagram.audio_device.title: Audio device
output_diagram.output.title: Output
output_diagram.resampler.title: Resampler
output_diagram.os_api.title: API
output_breakdown.title: Output breakdown
settings.local_sources.title: Local sources
settings.local_sources.description: Add local folders to your Amethyst library, these will update whenever Amethyst detects new or modified files
settings.appearance.title: Appearance
settings.appearance.custom_colors.title: Custom colors
settings.appearance.custom_colors.descri: Custom colors for the UI elements
settings.appearance.cover_based_colors.d: This will make the main accent colors based on the cover art of the currently playing song
settings.appearance.cover_based_icon_col: Matches the app icon color to the dynamic colors
settings.appearance.desktop_mode.title: Desktop mode
settings.appearance.desktop_mode.descrip: Reverts the ui to the desktop style, this might cause responsiveness issues on smaller screens
settings.performance.title: Performance
settings.behavior.title: Behavior
settings.metering.title: Metering
settings.audio.title: Audio
settings.media_sources.title: Media sources
settings.keybinds.title: Keybinds
settings.integrations.title: Integrations
settings.font_weight.title: Font weight
settings.font_weight.description: Changes how bold the font will be globally in the UI
settings.theme.title: Theme
settings.theme.description: Changes the theme of the application, this will change the background and the color of the UI elements
settings.queue.compact_mode.title: Compact mode
settings.queue.compact_mode.description: Reduces the height of the queue items to fit more items on the screen
settings.application.title: Application
settings.appearance.animation_duration.d: Changes the speed of the animations across the Amethyst UI
settings.max_decibels.title: Maximum decibels
settings.max_decibels.description: The upper limit of the vertical axis in decibels. Frequencies louder than this value will be clipped
settings.min_decibels.title: Minimum decibels
settings.min_decibels.description: The lower limit of the vertical axis in decibels. Frequencies quieter than this value will not be displayed
settings.appearance.ambient_background.d: Presents the cover art of the currently playing song on the background
settings.appearance.ambient_background.s: Use shader effects as cover alternative
Rotates the art in a circular motion constantly
Changes how fast the art will rotate
settings.appearance.ambient_background.o: Changes how visible the art is over the background
settings.appearance.ambient_background.b: Changes how much blur to apply in pixels (px)
settings.appearance.ambient_background.z: Adjusts the scaling of the art
settings.appearance.ambient_background.b: Changes how the ambient art is blended with the background
settings.appearance.playback_controls.de: Display the playback controls at the bottom of the application
settings.appearance.minimalist_mode.desc: Be less verbose on the UI to keep it clean
settings.appearance.minimalist_mode.hide: Hides the setting navigation titles to match the sidebar style
settings.appearance.neon_mode.title: Neon mode
settings.appearance.neon_mode.descriptio: Change the designs of certain UI elements to have a bloomy neon design
settings.appearance.cover_art.title: Cover art
settings.appearance.cover_art.descriptio: Render the cover art near the playback controls located at the bottom of the interface
settings.appearance.debug_stats.title: Debug statistics
settings.appearance.debug_stats.descript: Show numbers such as samples, FPS, processor usage and more at the top bar
settings.discord_rpc.description: Discord Rich Presence allows users to share their current activity on Amethyst with Discord. When enabled, the RPC feature updates the user's Discord status to show the version of Amethyst, currently playing song or playlist, along with the artist and album
settings.lastfm.description: Last.fm integration allows users to scrobble their music listening history to Last.fm. When enabled, Amethyst will automatically send the currently playing track information to Last.fm, allowing users to keep track of their listening habits and discover new music based on their preferences
settings.lastfm.username.title: Username
settings.lastfm.api_key.title: API Key
settings.lastfm.api_secret.title: API Secret
settings.lastfm.enable_scrobbling.title: Scrobbling
settings.lastfm.enable_scrobbling.descri: Enable scrobbling to send the currently playing track information to Last.fm
settings.auto_update.title: Automatic updates
settings.auto_update.description: Automatically check and install updates on startup
settings.launch_on_startup.title: Launch on startup
settings.launch_on_startup.description: Launch Amethyst when your system starts
settings.language.title: Language
settings.language.description: Change the language of the app
settings.fft_size.title: FFT size
settings.fft_size.description: Changes the FFT window size, bigger values result in higher resolution data but with more latency
settings.line_thickness.title: Line thickness
settings.line_thickness.description: Changes how thick / obvious the lines are
settings.smoothing_duration.title: Smoothing duration
settings.smoothing_duration.description: Smoothly animate between data-frames (useful for smoothing small FFT sizes that create jitter)
settings.decibel_meter.title: Decibel meter
settings.decibel_meter.description: Displays the current sound level of the audio signal in a graph, where the y-axis represents the sound level in decibels (dB)
settings.decibel_meter.separate_pre_post: Shows individual decibel meters, one for the signal before going into a node and one after
settings.decibel_meter.minimum_db.title: Minimum dB
settings.decibel_meter.minimum_db.descri: Changes the lowest value the decibel meter will register
settings.decibel_meter.smoothing_duratio: Smoothly animate between data-frames (useful for smoothing small FFT sizes that create jitter)
settings.loudness_meter.title: Loudness meter
settings.loudness_meter.description: Displays a visual representation of the perceived loudness of the audio signal measured in Loudness Units Full Scale (LUFS), which is a standardized measurement of perceived loudness
settings.vectorscope.title: Vectorscope
settings.vectorscope.description: Displays a visual representation of the stereo audio signal. It shows the relative phase and stereo width of the audio signal using a circular graph
settings.vectorscope.lissajous.title: Lissajous
settings.vectorscope.lissajous.descripti: Display diagonally in a Lissajous pattern
settings.spectrum_analyzer.title: Frequency spectrum analyzer
settings.spectrum_analyzer.description: Displays the frequency spectrum and their amplitudes of the audio signal using various visualization methods
settings.metering.spectrograph.logarithm: Spreads the frequencies in a logarithmic scale, this is useful for visualizing low frequencies
settings.metering.spectrograph.scroll_sp: Changes how fast the spectrograph scrolls
settings.spectrum_line_analyzer.line_thi: Changes how thick the line in the spectrum analyzer appears
settings.spectrum_line_analyzer.fill_opa: Changes how opaque the area under the line appears
settings.spectrum_line_analyzer.opacity_: Changes how much the opacity falls off under the line towards the bottom
settings.spectrum_bars_analyzer.bars.des: The amount of bars used to display frequencies
settings.oscilloscope_analyzer.title: Oscilloscope analyzer
settings.oscilloscope_analyzer.descripti: Displays the audio signal waveform, where the x-axis represents time and the y-axis represents amplitude
settings.processing_concurrency.title: Processing concurrency
settings.processing_concurrency.descript: How many processing tasks will be used for parsing metadata in parallel
settings.vsync.title: VSync
settings.vsync.description: Constrains the user interface (UI) framerate of Amethyst to the refresh rate of the active display
settings.fetch_metadata_on_startup.title: Fetch metadata on startup
settings.fetch_metadata_on_startup.descr: Fetch metadata of all songs in queue on startup, this function is delayed by 1 second (experimental)
settings.autoplay_on_startup.title: Start playing a song when Amethyst starts
settings.pause_visuals.title: Pause visuals when unfocused
settings.pause_visuals.description: Pause visualizers when tabbing out of Amethyst to reduce performance hit
settings.import_export.title: Import or export settings
settings.import_export.description: Backup your settings into a file or import existing settings
settings.reset.title: Reset settings
settings.reset.description: Reverts all settings to the factory default (can help fixing bugs)
settings.resampler_rate.title: Resampler rate
settings.resampler_rate.description: Forcefully resample sources before passing them to the Amethyst DSP, if using ASIO this setting will change your interface's sample-rate so it should be set to whatever your system is to avoid changing the sample-rate constantly
settings.audio_driver.title: Audio driver
settings.audio_driver.description: Select the backend used for audio output (e.g., WASAPI, ASIO, DirectSound)
settings.audio_driver.audio_device.title: Audio device
settings.audio_driver.audio_device.descr: Choose the output device associated with the selected audio driver
settings.audio_driver.audio_device.buffe: Adjust the number of audio samples per buffer. Lower values reduce latency but may cause glitches
inspector.title: Inspector
node.master.title: Master
node.output.title: Output
node.input.title: Input
node.filter.title: 12 dB/oct Filter
node.panner.title: Stereo Panner
node.gain.title: Gain
track.metadata.title: Title
track.metadata.label: Label
track.file.name: Filename
